name: Siddh vaani maun sawikaar bhava

name: Shukrana bhav paar bhava

name: Chidakash, param-akash bhava

name: Yagya vidya prasaar bhava

name: Rin anubandhan mukt bhava

name: Bhav prasaar blessing

name: Asur prabhav nasht bhava
description: Asur (negative energies) are not able to affect us.

name: Asur agyan prabhav nasht bhava

name: Swah sanyiti

name: Cancer mukt bhava

name: Bhootkal dukhdayi samriti mukt bhava

name: Deh naash bhav mukt bhava

name: Kaam urja moksh dawar bhava

name: Vichar bhava mukt bhava

name: Jealousy mukt bhava

name: Uphas kratya & unmaad mukt bhava

name: Aasjag karam bhava mukt bhava
